ALIGN_STAIRS.HINTLONG: If True, will be placed directly above upstairs, if self results in uglier maps.

AUTOSAFEMODE.HINTLONG: If True, safemode automatically back on after it being disabled beforehand.  See option 'Turns to re-enable safe mode'

AUTOSAFEMODETURNS.HINTLONG: Number of turns after safe mode is re-enabled if no hostiles are in 'Safe Mode proximity distance'.

AUTOSAVE.HINTLONG: If True, will periodically save the map.  Autosaves occur based on in-game turns or real-time minutes, is larger.

AUTOSAVE_MINUTES.HINTLONG: Number of real time minutes between autosaves

AUTOSAVE_TURNS.HINTLONG: Number of game turns between autosaves

AUTO_INV_ASSIGN.HINTLONG: If False, inventory items will only get letters assigned if they had one before.

AUTO_NOTES.HINTLONG: If True, sets notes on places that have stairs that go up or down

AUTO_PICKUP.HINTLONG: Enable item auto pickup.  Change pickup rules with the Auto Pickup Manager in the Help Menu ?3

AUTO_PICKUP_ADJACENT.HINTLONG: If True, enable to pickup items one tile around to the player.  You can assign No Auto Pickup zones with the Zones Manager 'Y' key for eg.  your homebase.

AUTO_PICKUP_SAFEMODE.HINTLONG: Auto pickup is disabled as long as you can see monsters nearby.  This is affected by 'Safe Mode proximity distance'.

AUTO_PICKUP_VOL_LIMIT.HINTLONG: Auto pickup items with volume less than or equal to [option] * 50 milliliters.  You must also set the light items option.  '0' disables self option

AUTO_PICKUP_WEIGHT_LIMIT.HINTLONG: Auto pickup items with weight less than or equal to [option] * 50 grams.  You must also set the small items option.  '0' disables self option

AUTO_PULP_BUTCHER.HINTLONG: If True, auto pulping resurrecting corpses or auto butchering any corpse.  Never pulps acidic corpses.  Disabled as long as any enemy monster is seen.

AUTO_PULP_BUTCHER_ACTION.HINTLONG: If True, auto pulping resurrecting corpses or auto butchering any corpse.  Never pulps acidic corpses.  Disabled as long as any enemy monster is seen.

CHARACTER_POINT_POOLS.HINTLONG: Allowed point pools for character generation.

CIRCLEDIST.HINTLONG: If True, game will calculate range in a realistic way: light sources will be circles, movement will cover more ground and take longer.  If disabled, is square: moving to the northwest corner of a building takes as long as moving to the north wall.

CITY_SIZE.HINTLONG: A number determining how large cities are.  0 disables cities, and any scenario requiring a city start.

CLASSIC_ZOMBIES.HINTLONG: Only spawn classic zombies and natural wildlife.  Requires a reset of save folder to take effect.  This disables certain buildings.

CLOSE_ADV_INV.HINT: Close advanced inventory on move all
CLOSE_ADV_INV.HINTLONG: If True, close the advanced inventory when the move all items command is used.

CONSTRUCTION_SCALING.HINTLONG: Sets the time of construction in percents.  '2.0' is two times faster than default, '0.5' is two times longer.  '0' automatically scales construction time to match the world's season length.

CORE_VERSION.HINTLONG: Controls what migrations are applied for legacy worlds

DANGEROUS_PICKUPS.HINTLONG: If False, cause player to drop items that cause them to exceed the weight limit.

DEATHCAM.HINTLONG: Always: Always start deathcam.  Ask: Query upon death.  Never: Never show deathcam.

DEFAULT_REGION.HINTLONG: ( WIP feature ) Determines terrain, shops, plants, more.

DEF_CHAR_NAME.HINTLONG: Set a default character name that will be used instead of a random name on character creation.

DELETE_WORLD.HINTLONG: Delete the world when the last active character dies.

DISABLE_VITAMINS.HINT: Disables tracking vitamins in food items.
DISABLE_VITAMINS.HINTLONG: If True, vitamin tracking and vitamin disorders.

DISTANCE_INITIAL_VISIBILITY.HINTLONG: Determines the scope, is known in the beginning of the game.

DRIVING_VIEW_OFFSET.HINTLONG: If True, will automatically shift towards the driving direction

DROP_EMPTY.HINTLONG: Set to drop empty containers after use.  No: Don't drop any. - Watertight: All except watertight containers. - All: Drop all containers.

FILTHY_MORALE.HINTLONG: If True, filthy clothing will cause morale penalties.

FILTHY_WOUNDS.HINTLONG: If True, hit in a body part covered in filthy clothing may cause infections.

FORCE_CAPITAL_YN.HINTLONG: If True, Y/N prompts are case-sensitive and y and n are not accepted.

HIDE_CURSOR.HINTLONG: Show: Cursor is always shown.  Hide: Cursor is hidden.  HideKB: Cursor is hidden on keyboard input and unhidden on mouse movement.

INITIAL_SEASON.HINTLONG: Season the player starts in.  Options other than the default delay spawn of the character, food decay and monster spawns will have advanced.

INITIAL_SKILL_POINTS.HINTLONG: Initial points available to spend on skills on character generation.

INITIAL_STAT_POINTS.HINTLONG: Initial points available to spend on stats on character generation.

INITIAL_TIME.HINTLONG: Initial starting time of day on character generation.

INITIAL_TRAIT_POINTS.HINTLONG: Initial points available to spend on traits on character generation.

INV_USE_ACTION_NAMES.HINT: Display actions in Use Item menu
HINTLONG: If True, actions ( like 'Read', 'Smoke', 'Wrap tighter' ) will be displayed next to the corresponding items.

ITEM_SPAWNRATE.HINTLONG: A scaling factor that determines density of item spawns.

ITEM_SYMBOLS.HINTLONG: If True, item symbols in inventory and pick up menu.

MAX_TRAIT_POINTS.HINTLONG: Maximum trait points available for character generation.

MONSTER_RESILIENCE.HINTLONG: Determines how much damage monsters can take.  A higher value makes monsters more resilient and a lower makes them more flimsy.

MONSTER_SPEED.HINTLONG: Determines the movement rate of monsters.  A higher value increases monster speed and a lower reduces it.

HINTLONG: A scaling factor that determines the time between monster upgrades.  A higher number means slower evolution.  Set to 0.00 to turn off monster upgrades.

NO_FAULTS.HINTLONG: If True, vehicle part faults, parts will be totally reliable unless destroyed, can only be repaired via replacement.

NPCS_NEED_FOOD.HINT: Disables tracking food, and ( partially ) fatigue for NPCs.
NPCS_NEED_FOOD.HINTLONG: If True, won't need to eat or drink and will only get tired enough to sleep, to get penalties.

NPC_DENSITY.HINTLONG: A scaling factor that determines density of dynamic NPC spawns.

OPEN_DEFAULT_ADV_INV.HINTLONG: Open default advanced inventory layout instead of last opened layout

QUERY_DISASSEMBLE.HINTLONG: If True, query before disassembling items.

QUERY_KEYBIND_REMOVAL.HINTLONG: If True, query before removing a keybinding from a hotkey.

RAD_MUTATION.HINTLONG: If True, causes the player to mutate.

RANDOM_NPC.HINTLONG: If True, game will randomly spawn NPC during gameplay.

SAFEMODE.HINTLONG: If True, hold the game and display a warning if a hostile monster/npc is approaching.

SAFEMODEPROXIMITY.HINTLONG: If safe mode is enabled, to hostiles at which safe mode should show a warning.  0 = Max player view distance.

SAFEMODEVEH.HINTLONG: When True, mode will alert you of hostiles while you are driving a vehicle.

SAVE_SLEEP.HINTLONG: If True, will ask to save the map before sleeping.

SIDEBAR_POSITION.HINTLONG: Switch between sidebar on the left or on the right side.  Requires restart.

SKILL_RUST.HINTLONG: Set the level of skill rust.  Vanilla: Vanilla Cataclysm - Capped: Capped at skill levels 2 - Int: Intelligence dependent - IntCap: Intelligence dependent, capped - Off: None at all.

SKILL_TRAINING_SPEED.HINTLONG: Scales experience gained from practicing skills and reading books.  0.5 is half as fast as default, 2.0 is twice as fast, 0.0 disables skill training except for NPC training.

SNAP_TO_TARGET.HINTLONG: If True, follow the crosshair when firing/throwing.

SPAWN_DENSITY.HINTLONG: A scaling factor that determines density of monster spawns.

STATIC_NPC.HINTLONG: If True, game will spawn static NPC at the start of the game, world reset.

SURROUND_START.HINTLONG: If True, zombies at shelters.  Makes the starting game a lot harder.

TILESET.HINTLONG: Choose the tileset you want to use.

TURN_DURATION.HINTLONG: If enabled, will take periodic gameplay turns.  This value is the delay between each turn, seconds.  Works best with Safe Mode disabled.  0 = disabled.

VEHICLE_ARMOR_COLOR.HINTLONG: If True, parts will change color if they are armor plated

VEHICLE_DIR_INDICATOR.HINTLONG: If True, controlling a vehicle, white 'X' ( in curses version ) or a crosshair ( in tiles version ) at distance 10 from the center will display its current facing.

WANDER_SPAWNS.HINTLONG: Emulation of zombie hordes.  Zombie spawn points wander around cities and may go to noise.  Must reset world directory after changing for it to take effect.

ZLEVELS.HINTLONG: If True, z-level maps will be enabled.  This feature is not finished yet and turning it on will only slow the game down.
